__e: Now, if we did something wrong or offended you somehow...
I have never been so offended in my life.
Look, I'm sorry if I did anything to disrespect you or your family.
I am sorry if I have offended my king.
I don't trust him, but if I was in Russia hunting a Mutt who'd wronged my Pack,
Second of all, I forgive you for slagging my tree, for I carry with me the true meaning of Christmas.
- I think I hurt your girlfriend's feelings.
Well, I'm so sorry if I upset you the night before you'll probably kill me!
A member of the Alliance accused me of stealing, he offended my woman, then someone shot up her shop.
And... don't be offended by this, but... I thought it was you who was somehow behind all this.
He has always felt slighted by his father, but he would never hurt anyone.
I don't want you to be offended by this, but, if-- if it turns out that your friend is actually you,
Well, I'm just peeved you didn't ask us for help.
- I did, I did, and I am not offended that you don't remember because when you're a crewman, doing your job right means... Ethan?
What challenge? He's upset that you said his finder power isn't real.
And if I have ever wronged you, it was fear.
And I was offended and... actually afraid, really, for the future of our country, but... The more I thought about it, the more I realize how sweet it was.
Did I miss a part of the conversation? Where I said something off-colour?
